title: 820-2914 GPU white screen
message:
One for all the BGA nuts here.
Got an 820-2914 that i replaced the GPU on, First boot was perfect. After the first boot i shut it down to boot to a USB drive for some stress testing.
Since then its just white screened at boot, (just sticks on white, doesn't shut down)
This is the second time ive had a 2914 with the same behaviour. 
It was a straight 005 replacement, I have reflown the VRAM and GPU again and checked for missing components. 

Also this is strange because it was booting prior however it was shutting down during stress testing. It is a apple refurb board.

title: 820-2914 GPU white screen
message: Yeah refurb board, trash it. For now I believe these are internal board issues.
